872460.name: Queen of the Pack
872460.description:
[Long in-development title. Add to your Wishlist to receive future info.]

About:
After a near-death experience, Farrah is propelled into a world of half-wolves and a mysterious society she never knew existed. Caught between her new life as a pack member and her human roots, she faces a difficult choice.

As Farrah grows closer to the pack members, she becomes entangled in a web of intrigue and romance that only deepens...

Queen of the Pack is a captivating yuri visual novel combining romance, fantasy, drama, and action in an exhilarating narrative.

---------------------------------

  • Romance the Wolf Queen's three daughters; Layla, "Bunny", and Deirdre - or pursue the Wolf Queen herself.
  • Experience four unique yuri romance routes, as well as other hidden paths to uncover.
  • Strengthen your relationships and rise through the pack's hierarchy, gaining the power to shape key story decisions.
  • Dive into an enthralling tale filled with twists, secrets, and the challenge of balancing love and leadership.
  • Choose to follow an existing pack alpha or forge your path as a respected and pragmatic leader.
